comment:
Chop saw:A metal-working equipment that can cut 25 pounds of steel and generates 25 units of waste every day.
Steel cutter:A metal-working equipment that can cut 5 pounds of steel and generates 3 units of waste every day.
Waste limitation:The maximum amount of waste that can be produced every day, which in this case is 400 units due to potential fines for excessive waste.
